    const htmlEntities = {
  '&': '&amp;',
  '\'': '&#39;',
  '<': '&lt;',
  '>': '&gt;',
  '"': '&quot;',
};

//Transform snake_case to camelCase
const regexSnake = /([A-Za-z0-9])_([A-Za-z0-9])/g;
const snakeToCamel = str => str.replace(regexSnake, (m, p1, p2) => p1 + p2.toUpperCase());

function titleCase (str) {
  if (!str.length) {
    return '';
  }
  if (str.length === 1) {
    return str.toUpperCase();
  }
  return str[0].toUpperCase() + str.substr(1).toLowerCase();
}

/**
 * Escapes a string so it can be used in a regular expression
 */
function escapeForRegex (string) {
  //This puts a \ in front of the replaced characters
  return string.replace(/[|\\{}()[\]^$+*?.]/g, '\\$&');
}

/**
 * Escapes a string for use in HTML
 */
function escapeForHtml (str) {
  return str && str.replace(/[&'<>"]/g, c => htmlEntities[c]);
}

function toSlug (string) {
  return `${string}`.toLowerCase()
    .replace(/\s+/g, '-')     // Replace spaces with -
    .replace(/[^\w-]+/g, '')  // Remove all non-word chars
    .replace(/--+/g, '-')     // Replace multiple - with single -
    .replace(/^-+/, '')       // Trim - from start of text
    .replace(/-+$/, '');      // Trim - from end of text
}

function leftPad (string, length, padding = ' ') {
  string = `${string}`;

  while (string.length < length) {
    string = `${padding}${string}`;
  }
  return string;
}

module.exports = {
  snakeToCamel,
  titleCase,
  escapeForRegex,
  escapeForHtml,
  toSlug,
  leftPad,
  regexSnake,
};
